Name: Travelers Compass
Description: A simple yet reliable compass that always points towards the safest path.

Abilities.Name: Guiding Needle
Abilities.Effect: Once per floor, reveals the safest path forward.

Name: Whispering Coin
Description: A tarnished coin that murmurs when flipped, predicting fortune or misfortune.

Abilities.Name: Flip for Fate
Abilities.Effect: Once per encounter, flip a coin. Heads: Gain +1 to your next roll. Tails: -1 to your next roll.

Name: Rune-Carved Stone
Description: A small stone covered in ancient runes, radiating a faint magical warmth.

Abilities.Name: Runic Protection
Abilities.Effect: Once per floor, gain +2 to a single defense roll.

Name: Phantoms Locket
Description: A locket containing a blurry image. It hums with unseen energy.

Abilities.Name: Flickering Presence
Abilities.Effect: When rolling for stealth, roll twice and take the higher result.

Name: Everburning Candle
Description: A candle that never melts nor flickers, providing steady light.

Abilities.Name: Steady Glow
Abilities.Effect: Illuminates darkness and reveals hidden glyphs or writings within 5 spaces.

Name: Echoing Conch
Description: Holding this shell to your ear lets you hear distant voices.

Abilities.Name: Distant Murmurs
Abilities.Effect: Once per floor, listen to distant sounds from a room ahead.

Name: Pocket Watch of Punctuality
Description: A watch that is always perfectly on time, down to the second.

Abilities.Name: Predictive Timing
Abilities.Effect: Once per encounter, gain +1 to an initiative roll.

Name: Feather of Light Steps
Description: A delicate feather that makes footsteps eerily quiet.

Abilities.Name: Silent Step
Abilities.Effect: Once per encounter, ignore movement-based traps.

Name: Charm of Minor Luck
Description: A tiny rabbits foot that tingles when held.

Abilities.Name: Lucky Break
Abilities.Effect: Once per encounter, reroll a failed skill check.

Name: Bottled Starlight
Description: A vial containing shimmering liquid light.

Abilities.Name: Radiant Glow
Abilities.Effect: Once per floor, dispel magical darkness in a room.

Name: Echo Stone
Description: A small stone that records brief sounds.

Abilities.Name: Replay Sound
Abilities.Effect: Can record and replay a sound up to 10 seconds long.

Name: Wanderers Map
Description: A worn parchment that changes to reflect the surrounding area.

Abilities.Name: Pathfinder
Abilities.Effect: Once per floor, reveal a hidden passage or shortcut.

Name: Gamblers Dice
Description: A pair of old dice, warm to the touch.

Abilities.Name: High Stakes Roll
Abilities.Effect: Once per encounter, roll a d6. On a 6, refresh an action. On a 1, lose an action.

Name: Travelers Knot
Description: A length of enchanted rope that never tangles.

Abilities.Name: Secure Grip
Abilities.Effect: Once per floor, automatically succeed a climbing check.

Name: Mirror of Reflection
Description: A hand mirror that always shows the true form of its wielder.

Abilities.Name: True Sight
Abilities.Effect: Once per floor, reveal an illusion or disguise.
